Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

static void GPIO_clearInterrupt ( uint8_t  port,
uint8_t  pin 
)
static

Description
The function is used to clear the interrupt on the GPIO Port/Pin

Parameters
[in]portGPIO Port Number to be configured
[in]pinGPIO Pin number associated with the port
Return values
Notapplicable
static void GPIO_configPolarity ( uint8_t  port,
uint8_t  pin,
uint8_t  highLevel 
)
static

Description
The function is used to configure the GPIO Port/Pin to control the interrupt polarity

Parameters
[in]portGPIO Port Number to be configured
[in]pinGPIO Pin number associated with the port
[in]highLevelSet to 1 to indicate that the interrupt be triggered on rising edge Set to 0 to indicate that the interrupt be triggered on falling edge
Return values
Notapplicable

[in]pinGPIO Pin number associated with the port
Return values
Notapplicable

static uint8_t GPIO_getData ( uint8_t  port,
uint8_t  pin 
)
static

Description
The function is used to get the data input for a specific GPIO Port/Pin

Parameters
[in]portGPIO Port Number
[in]pinGPIO Pin number associated with the port
Return values
0- Logic Low
1- Logic High
static uint8_t GPIO_getHighLevelPendingInterrupt ( void  )
static

Description
The function is used to get the high level interrupt pending. The driver will need to cycle through all the pending interrupts before the processing of the interrupt is over

Return values
0- No pending interrupt
NonZero - Highest Pending Interrupt
static uint8_t GPIO_getLowLevelPendingInterrupt ( void  )
static

Description
The function is used to get the low level interrupt pending. The driver will need to cycle through all the pending interrupts before the processing of the interrupt is over

Return values
0- No pending interrupt
NonZero - Lowest Pending Interrupt
static void GPIO_HighPriorityISR ( uintptr_t  arg)
static

Description
The function is the registered ISR which handles the high priority GPIO Interrupts

Parameters
[in]argNot used
Return values
Notapplicable

uint8_t  pin 
)
static

Description
The function is used to configure the GPIO Port/Pin to honor the polarity.

Parameters

[in]pinGPIO Pin number associated with the port
Return values
Notapplicable

static void GPIO_setOpenDrainStatus ( uint8_t  port,
uint8_t  pin,
uint8_t  openDrainStatus 
)
static

Description
The function is used to enable/disable open drain functionality for a specific GPIO Port/Pin

Parameters
[in]portGPIO Port Number
[in]pinGPIO Pin number associated with the port
[in]openDrainStatusSet to 1 to enable open drain functionality Set to 0 to disable open drain functionality
Return values
Notapplicable
static void GPIO_setOutputDataDirection ( uint8_t  port,
uint8_t  pin,
uint8_t  dataDirection 
)
static

Description
The function is used to set the output data direction associated with a GPIO Port/Pin.

Parameters
[in]portGPIO Port Number to be configured
[in]pinGPIO Pin number associated with the port
[in]dataDirectionSet to 1 to enable the output data direction Set to 0 to disable the output data direction
Return values
Notapplicable
